flag Package¶

flagModel Module¶

fla.gr flag model

http://xkcd.com/353/

Josh Ashby 2013 http://joshashby.com joshuaashby@joshashby.com

models.flag.flagModel.formatFlag(flag)¶

Same as above, however takes a single flagORM and formates the datetime markdown.

Parameters:flag – The flagORM object of the flag to format
Returns:
models.flag.flagModel.formatFlags(flagsList, showAll)¶

Takes a list of flagORM`s and formates the datetime and markdown for templates. Also can remove non public flags, if `showAll is False

Params flagsList:
 A list object of flagORMs to format
Params showAll:If False Then private flags will be removed from the list
Returns:A list of formated flagORM objects
models.flag.flagModel.listFlagsByUserID(userID)¶

Searches couchdb for flags by the requested userID

Parameters:userID – The userID to search for
Returns:A list of flagORM instances at least one flag is found, and the userORM object for the flags author None if no flags are found
